from 4700 to 5700 hosted customer databases during this time IT team grew from two to four members during this time After demonstrating a high level of mastery at the roles responsibilities duties and tasks assigned to me as a Systems Administrator I was promoted to Senior Systems Administrator after two years Selected Achievements Solutions Increased performance redundancy and faulttolerance of
